bluepayment.note: After placing the order, you will be redirected to the payment page.
bluepaymentPage.pending: Your order has been accepted - we are waiting for payment.
bluepaymentPage.pendingSecond: As soon as we receive positive information - the order will be transferred for execution.
bluepaymentPage.failure: The order has not been paid.
bluepaymentPage.failureSecond: Retry your payment via the link below or contact us.
